channel.title: Silly on Craig Citro
channel.description: Recent content in Silly on Craig Citro

item.title: Math Jokes
item.description: I saw these on mathoverflow: The primary reason Bourbaki stopped writing books was the realization that Lang was one single person. A paper should be like a miniskirt: short enough to be interesting and long enough to cover the subject.

item.title: Great quote
item.description: From Chris: “apple is like the really hot girl u didnt know was whack”
